channel.title: Running Linux!
channel.description:
First time actually using Linux right now :D I love it!
I'm running it on my Pentium 4 2001 computer, very slow computer while running XP. But with Linux it runs quite smoothly.
Working through getting my dualboot with Linux/XP going, almost done.
